targets.expr: sum(hclcache_remoteclient_outage{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"})
sum(hclcache_remoteclient_outage{namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod) > 0
sum(hclcache_cache_outage{namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"})
sum(hclcache_cache_outage{namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (name) > 0

panels.description: Cache Manager pod must be enabled

targets.expr: max( (  hclcache_cache_size_current{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache" } > 0 ) * on ( pod, namespace, cachespace, name) group_left( redis_instance ) hclcache_cache_remote_node_mapping{ redis_instance =~ "$redis"  }) by ( name, redis_instance )

panels.title: Remote Cache Sizes

panels.description:
This dashboard only works if Redis is installed
locally with metrics enabled

targets.expr: redis_memory_used_bytes
max(redis_memory_max_bytes)

panels.title: Redis Memory

targets.expr: sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_clears_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(increase(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(increase(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(increase(hclcache_cache_clears_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(increase(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m])) by (name) > 0

panels.title: Get Ops per Cache per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace",cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]) ) by (name)

panels.title: Put Ops per Cache per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(hclcache_cache_clears_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace",cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]) ) by (name)

panels.title: Clear Ops per Cache per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace",cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]) ) by (name)

panels.title: Invalidate Ops per Cache per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m])) / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]))

sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m])) / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]))

sum(rate(hclcache_cache_removes_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m])) / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]))

sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m])) / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[2m]))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", cachespace="$environment",job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"}[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_clears_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"}[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_removes_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"  }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_puts_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"}[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_clears_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidates_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hclcache_cache_removes_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" }[5m])) by (le))
sum by (result) (rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result !="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))

sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result ="hit", name=~"$cache"}[2m])) / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_gets_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result !="error", name=~"$cache"}[2m]))
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidation_messages_total{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", type="dependency", name=~"$cache"} [2m] ) ) by (name) > 0
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_invalidation_messages_total{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", type="clear", name=~"$cache"}[2m])) by (name) > 0

panels.description:
This chart shows the number of keys  that have expired and are pending to be removed by the maintenance processes. Large numbers could indicate maintenance is failing or behind
Cache Manager pod must be enabled

targets.expr: sum( hclcache_cache_size_maintenance{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache" } ) by ( name )  > 0

panels.title: Number of Expired Keys Pending Maintenance

targets.expr: sum( rate( hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_keys_total{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache", scope="remote", type="expired" }[5m]) > 0 ) by  (name)

panels.title: Rate of Expired Keys Removed by Cache

panels.description: When the HCL Cache detects that the memory in Redis is almost full, it can temporarily stop PUT operations while Low-Memory maintenance is running

targets.expr: sum( hclcache_cache_remote_put_paused{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", name=~"$cache" } ) by (name)  > 0

panels.title: Low-Memory Maintenance - Paused PUT Operations by Cache

targets.expr: sum( rate( hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_keys_total{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache", scope="remote", type="inactive" }[5m]) ) by  ( name )
sum( rate( hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_keys_total{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache", scope="remote" }[5m]  ) ) by  ( type )

panels.title: Rate of Inactive Keys Maintained by Cache

targets.expr:
sum(rate(hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"}[2m])) by (type)
 / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache"}[2m])) by (type)

sum(rate(hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_duration_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache", type="emergency" }[2m]) ) 
 / sum(rate(hclcache_cache_maintenance_online__duration_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", name=~"$cache", type="emergency"}[2m]))

sum( rate( hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_keys_total{ namespace="$namespace", cachespace="$environment", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result!="error", name=~"$cache", scope="remote" }[5m]  ) ) by  ( type )
sum( rate( hclcache_cache_maintenance_online_keys_total{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", scope="remote", result="error", name=~"$cache", scope="remote" }[5m]  ) ) by  ( type )

panels.title: Rate of Keys Maintained by Type
